  • Method Details

    • seeUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") public String seeUsers(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /users request. Allows for viewing all the users in the database.
      Parameters:
      model - contains a list of userDTOs
      Returns:
      the html page "users"

    • seeCurrentUser

      @GetMapping("/user") public String seeCurrentUser(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /user request. Allows to view currently logged-in user's details.
      Parameters:
      model - contains the currently logged-in user
      Returns:
      the html page "user-details"

    • viewUserDetails

      @GetMapping("/users/user-admin-details/{id}") public String viewUserDetails(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /users/user-admin-details/{id} request, with variable id. Allows admins to view any user and admin-only details, such as their roles.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user to be viewed
      model - contains the user to be viewed
      Returns:
      the html page "user-admin-details"

    • removeUser

      @GetMapping("/users/remove-user/{id}") public String removeUser(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /users/remove-user/{id} request with variable id. Available only for id to delete the user with the aforementioned variable id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user to be deleted
      model - contains the new and updated list of users
      Returns:
      redirects to the /users request

    • viewLeaderboard

      @GetMapping("/leaderboard") public String viewLeaderboard(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /leaderboard request. Allows to view all users in the database sorted by their tokens in descending fashion based on their token count, with rankings.
      Parameters:
      model - contains the list of user DTOs, sorted
      Returns:
      the html page "leaderboard"
